title: Understanding Future, Past and Present Tenses
headline: This free online English course covers the fundamental grammar principles for the past, present and future tense.
description: There are twelve fundamental tenses in English, which can make learning English challenging. Why use the correct tense? What is the structure of the simple past? This course explains the nature and structure of the present-perfect continuous tense. We examine all its functions and then study the past continuous tense. In addition, we establish the benefits of understanding these tenses. Enrol today and master grammar structure.
courseDescription:
This course investigates the structure and usage of the twelve primary tenses in English. We begin by studying the present simple and present continuous form, including its uses and structure. In addition, we explore how to use the present perfect continuous. Before reviewing the simple past, we will demonstrate the benefits of understanding these grammar structures.

The course then examines the grammar forms of past perfect continuous tense. It will teach you to analyse information about the future continuous tense. Finally, we will help you research the future continuous usage and practical ways you can handle verbs. We will review some examples using future perfect voice. This course will also examine the use of each tense. It will help you answer questions like ‘what is the structure of the present perfect continuous?’ or ‘what is the proper use of the future perfect?’.

This course teaches you how to read the primary tenses of English. We provide precise rules and structural foundations so you can confidently use them with confidence. This course is ideal for understanding future, past and present tenses. So enrol right away and study the essentials of these grammar tenses.
